sf162:4: nāyaṁ bhikṣavaḥ kāyo yuṣmākaṁ nāpy anyeṣām | ṣaḍ imāni sparśāyatanāni pūrvam abhisaṁskṛtāny abhisañcetitāni | paurāṇaṁ karma veditavyam iti vadāmi |
sf162:5: katamāni ṣaṭ | cakṣuḥ sparśāyatanam | śrotraṁ ghrāṇaṁ jihvā kāyo manaḥ sparśāyatanam |
sf162:6: tatra śrutavān āryaśrāvakaḥ pratītyasamutpādam eva sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca yoniśaḥ pratyavekṣate |
sf162:7: yadutāsmin sati ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā bhavanti | ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ ṣaḍ vedanākāyāḥ ṣaṭ saṁjñākāyāḥ ṣaṭ cetanākāyā bhavanti | yadutāsmin saty evam āyatyāṁ jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṁbhavanti | evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati |
sf162:8: evaṁ hi sahetuḥ sapratyayo lokaḥ samudeti | evaṁ hi sahetoḥ sapratyayasya lokasya samudayo bhavati |
sf162:9: yadutāsminn asati ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā na bhavanti | ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ ṣaḍ vedanākāyāḥ ṣaṭ saṁjñākāyāḥ ṣaṭ cetanākāyā na bhavanti | yadutāsminn asaty evam āyatyām jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā nirudhyante | evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati |
sf162:10: yataś ca śrutavatāryaśrāvakeṇa lokasamudayaś ca lokanirodhaś ca yathābhūtaṁ samyakprajñayā sudṛṣṭo bhavati suviditaḥ sujuṣṭaḥ supratividdhaḥ | ayam ucyate āryāśrāvakaḥ | āgata imaṁ saddharmam upagata imaṁ saddharmam avaiti saddharmam ity ucyate ’vagāḍhaprāptaḥ paryavagāḍhaprāptaḥ śaikṣeṇa jñānena śaikṣeṇa darśanena lokasyodayāstaṁgāminyā prajñayā samanvāgata āryayā nairyāṇikayā nairvedhikayā niryāti tatkaraḥ samyagduḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai |
sf162:11: tat kasmād dhetoḥ | tathā hi śrutavatāryaśrāvakeṇa lokasamudayaś ca lokanirodhaś ca yathābhūtaṁ samyakprajñayā sudṛṣṭaḥ suviditaḥ supratividdhaḥ ||
